title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
description: Learn how to set up a React development environment using Create React App

content.instructions: Follow these steps to set up your React development environment:

steps.title: Install Node.js
steps.description: Download and install Node.js from nodejs.org (version 14 or higher)
steps.code:
# Check if Node.js is installed
node --version
npm --version

steps.title: Create a new React app
steps.description: Use Create React App to bootstrap your project

steps.title: Start the development server
steps.description: Run the development server to see your app in action

steps.title: Explore the project structure
steps.description: Familiarize yourself with the generated files and folders
steps.details:
- src/ - Contains your React components
- public/ - Static assets
- package.json - Project dependencies
